LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.description: It’s a simple-minded claim that this planet doesn’t have exotic and beautiful lands to appreciate and immerse oneself in. Traveling this world should be a priority.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.description: Every moment spent away from home is another moment running away from the inevitable. Time spent traveling can be spent more wisely at home building and defending it.
